statements: UPSERT INTO strategy(id, strategy_name, strategy_description) VALUES (1, 'Trend Following', 'Follows market trends') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE strategy_name = 'Trend Following', strategy_description = 'Follows market trends';

UPSERT INTO trade(trade_id, strategy_id, symbol, entry_price, exit_price, trade_date) VALUES (1, 1, 'AAPL', 150.25, 155.30, '2022-08-15') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE strategy_id = 1, symbol = 'AAPL', entry_price = 150.25, exit_price = 155.30, trade_date = '2022-08-15';

UPSERT INTO performance(performance_id, strategy_id, total_returns, max_drawdown, total_trades) VALUES (1, 1, 560.50, 45.20, 10) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE strategy_id = 1, total_returns = 560.50, max_drawdown = 45.20, total_trades = 10;
UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com';

UPSERT INTO stocks (stock_id, stock_symbol, stock_name, stock_price) VALUES (1, 'AAPL', 'Apple Inc.', 1500.25) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stock_symbol='AAPL', stock_name='Apple Inc.', stock_price=1500.25;

UPSERT INTO orders (order_id, user_id, stock_id, order_type, order_quantity, order_price, order_status) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'BUY', 10, 1500.25, 'OPEN') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id=1, stock_id=1, order_type='BUY', order_quantity=10, order_price=1500.25, order_status='OPEN';

UPSERT INTO stocks (symbol, price, volume, last_updated) VALUES ('AAPL', 150.25, 1000, '2022-10-10 12:00:00') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE price = 150.25, volume = 1000, last_updated = '2022-10-10 12:00:00';
UPSERT INTO portfolio (id, symbol, quantity) VALUES (1, 'AAPL', 50) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE symbol = 'AAPL', quantity = 50;

UPSERT INTO trades (trade_id, symbol, quantity, trade_type, trade_date) VALUES (1001, 'AAPL', 10, 'BUY', '2022-10-10') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE symbol = 'AAPL', quantity = 10, trade_type = 'BUY', trade_date = '2022-10-10';
